title: Not a Joke, the Pentagon Wants to Name a Warship the USS Fallujah
description:
Why is the U.S. choosing to celebrate its most murderous and merciless battles in Iraq?

The post Not a Joke, the Pentagon Wants to Name a Warship the USS Fallujah appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Emboldened Right-Wing Activists Spread Lies About Rep. Katie Porter on Twitter
description:
Video of Rep. Katie Porter calling out right-wing activists for falsely accusing LGBTQ+ Americans of being pedophiles was misleadingly edited to accuse her of condoning pedophilia.

The post Emboldened Right-Wing Activists Spread Lies About Rep. Katie Porter on Twitter appeared first on The Intercept.
